kw.name: New Context
kw.doc: Create a new BrowserContext with specified options.

kw.name: New Page
kw.doc: Open a new Page.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Fill Secret
kw.doc: Fills the given secret from ``variable_name`` into the text field found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: New Browser
kw.doc: Create a new playwright Browser with specified options.

kw.name: New Context
kw.doc: Create a new BrowserContext with specified options.

kw.name: New Page
kw.doc: Open a new Page.

kw.name: Wait For Load State
kw.doc: Waits that the page reaches the required load state.

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Fill Secret
kw.doc: Fills the given secret from ``variable_name`` into the text field found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns text attribute of the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Take Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current window or element and saves it to disk.

kw.name: Get Cookies
kw.doc: Returns cookies from the current active browser context.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

test.doc: Log in via de browser en gebruik de sessie voor een API check.
test.status:
